flotsam.translation[0].definitions[0].de: broken pieces of wood and other things from a wrecked ship, floating in the sea or scattered on the shore
flotsam.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He would walk along the beach collecting the flotsam and jetsam that had been washed ashore.
flotsam.translation[0].definitions[1].de: things that people no longer want and so throw away
flotsam.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: works of art made from the flotsam and jetsam of everyday life
flotsam.translation[0].definitions[2].de: people who are very poor and do not have jobs or homes
flotsam.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Camps were set up to shelter the flotsam and jetsam of the war.
